General.Name: paragon GmbH & Co. KGaA
General.Description: paragon GmbH & Co. KGaA develops, produces, and distributes automotive electronics, body kinematics, and e-mobility solutions for the automotive industry in Germany, European Union, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Electronics and Mechanics. The Electronics segment develops and sells sensors, microphones, and instruments primarily for the automotive industry. The Mechanics segment develops and markets electromechanical components for the automotive and mechanical manufacturing industries. paragon GmbH & Co. KGaA was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Delbrück, Germany.
